intro: Psychotria euaensis, commonly known as the Eua Psychotria, is a flowering plant belonging to the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of Central and South America, particularly found in the Caribbean. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white or pale pink flowers. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forest understories. Psychotria euaensis is also known for its mild psychoactive properties due to the presence of certain alkaloids.
